About Me

Based in London, 13+ years of expertise in frontend development. Main focus on UI, UX, and branding. I'm passionate about creating intuitive, beautifully designed interfaces that prove simplicity is not just elegant but essential.

Examples of my work

Weather App

Weather Ease is a modern weather forecasting app designed for simplicity and accessibility. My role involved developing the frontend user interface, ensuring responsiveness across devices, and implementing clean, scalable CSS. I also collaborated closely with the design team to translate high-fidelity mockups into an engaging and user-friendly experience. The result was an intuitive application that provided essential weather data with minimal clutter, focusing on usability and visual appeal.

Finance Dashboard

InFinance is a personal finance management app aimed at streamlining budgeting and financial tracking. For this project, I developed the frontend architecture using modern tools, ensuring smooth interactions and dynamic data visualizations. My contributions included integrating real-time API data, designing reusable components for financial graphs and cards, and optimizing performance for mobile devices. The final product delivered a seamless financial management experience with a focus on clarity and interactivity.

View Details
category
App Development
client
InFinance
tags
Mobile App
launched
May 2024

Delivery Platform

Green Courier is a B2B delivery app designed for efficient package tracking and order management. I was responsible for implementing the app's frontend, including map integration for real-time courier tracking and the user dashboard. Working alongside the UX team, I ensured the design remained intuitive and accessible while addressing complex functionality requirements. My involvement also included optimising the app for fast load times and creating reusable components for future scalability.
